trans-unit.target: TEXT_AKTKYR102_04171_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_000<tab><gasp> Who should stand before me but the savior of the very star─the inimitable ender of the end! Your deeds are sung of far and wide, my friend!

TEXT_AKTKYR102_04171_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_001<tab>As I understand it, your quest for the world's salvation brought you to Sharlayan. I, too, am here on a quest of sorts─the quest for musical inspiration.
TEXT_AKTKYR102_04171_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_002<tab>Alas, magnificent though this repository of knowledge may be, I find there is only so much inspiration I can derive from tomes...
TEXT_AKTKYR102_04171_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_003<tab>But where tomes alone fail to inspire, living words may yet spark the imagination!

TEXT_AKTKYR102_04171_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_004<tab>So I beg you, will you not regale me with the tale of your quest to deliver the star? If such an adventure isn't fit to be an epic, I would not know what is!
TEXT_AKTKYR102_04171_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_005<tab>Drawing upon both your firsthand account and the knowledge I attain here, I believe that I shall be able to weave the most marvelous of verses!
TEXT_AKTKYR102_04171_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_006<tab>Should you be willing, pray let me know. I shall continue my research here in the meantime.
